reviews.review:
O jogo é divertido. Jogar de killer tem seus graceios, apesar de em 60% das partidas você ter um AVC. E jogar de surv com amigos é a receita pra dar umas risadas (e todo mundo morrer).

Porém, o jogo tem muito bug, que as vezes é conhecido e a desenvolvedora não trabalha. O hit validation é algo que eles não conseguem dar um jeito então sempre vai ter alguém que vai ficar mad por conta disso e o pior: O grinding. Pra você upar as teias dos personagens vai um BOM tempo, então você vai ficar um tempo maneiro pra conseguir jogar como você quer de verdade - principalmente se você jogar de killer, que é interessante usar algumas perks que controlem gen rush e afins.

É bom, mas poderia melhorar.

垃圾至极的匹配系统，18段屠夫，血网5级的角色，匹配上3 6 8 8的两个带红齿轮高配车队。修完不还跑蹲起，自带所有气场技能，赢了很自豪？
我要求也不高，进房间后能告诉我这四个人是不是车队就行。让他们匹配到天荒地老去吧，你看谁稀罕和他们玩，怕设计师都是单边人。
新人入坑一定要买巴布这个dlc不为别的就为了整死一个是一个。
при игре за манов надень щит на попку а то сурвы тебя чпок чпок
Yes there is toxicity in the game, but overall a fun game to play, esp with friends
this game is so sweaty but so fun at the same time love it

This game can be broken, and it can break you. Play at your own risk.

But very fun.

Amazing game, great for the entire family it's about a kid trying to get to sleep before daylight comes, if you don't manage to do everything to get to bed before daylight you lose.
fix generators so you can escape gus frings compound (HE WONT LET YOU BREAK BAD)
啥时候能出个可以直接献祭杀手的。15段的我每次都是紫段每次都是4跑不过厉害的我分都比他们高。。都2202年了，真不敢相信这半成品和过时的游戏：垃圾的匹配机制和平衡性。都还每天有5w人在玩。。更新过多少次了，我才玩了不到200h还能被脱缰野马搞过。。要不是各种联动还能解锁全部dlc早吃灰了。买dlc的都是冤大头

During my entire experience with Dead By Daylight- and it has been a journey forged of sweat and a lot of blood- I have felt closer and closer to understand what exactly the team does. Not a whole lot. Don't expect any respect from them for your main, and if you are into edging this game is perfect because all it does is abuse you.

Только зашёл спустя год - сразу завоняло говном, не рекомендую!

It's a really fun and addictive but it does have it's issues and plenty of them tunneling camping the meta taking forever to be changed killers needing buffs and nerfs constantly I love it and I'd give it a solid 9/10 but it can be frustrating and have it's cons they only just started cracking down on the issues which alot could argue is better late than never but after six years it shouldn't have even been a couple years
jogo de temores e pavores ,senhoras e senhores bem vindo ao circo dos horrores

Als ich das Spiel (nach viel Gerede von meinen Freunden) gekauft habe, fand ich das Spiel noch ansatzweise gut. Ich habe vor DBD Friday the 13th gespielt (ein sehr gutes Game für die Filme). Mit der Zeit hat sich das Spiel immer weiter verschlechtert und es wurde nur noch Veteranen-Freundlich (Also für Spieler die das Spiel nur noch am Tryharden sind). 

Gründe warum man sich dieses Spiel jetzt nicht mehr kaufen sollte:
-Tryhardspieler im übermasse
-Buggs bis zum abwinken (die sind so übermässig und werden nicht mal gefixxt)
-Camper und Tunnler als Killer im übermasse und es wird nichts dagegen gemacht
-Kein Matchmaking vorhanden
-Communityzusammenhalt ist nicht vorhanden
-Survivor Teabaggen und Flashlight-Spammen
-Hacks sind gefühlt in jeder Runde vorhanden
-Hitboxen von Killer und Survivor sind so ekelhaft, da weiss man nicht mal wo die sind und ob die überhaupt vorhanden sind

Meine Empfehlung für Spieler, die zusammen neu ein Spiel beginnen wollen, investiert euer Geld in ein anderes Spiel bei dem ein Support, Matchmaking und auch eine gute Community vorhanden sind. Kauft euch ein GTA, Among Us, Minecraft oder sonstige Spiele wo man genau weiss, dass die Programmierer noch dafür ihr Herzblut geben und nicht dem Geld hinterher geiern.
Would recommend, good price, community a little toxic

After roughly 500 hours at the time of writing this review, I can confidently say that this is a pretty good game. 

Are there balance issues? Oh yeah. Are they things that need changed? Absolutely. But what game doesn't have these kinds of issues?

If you're just starting out, start leveling up David and Bill on the survivor side and Hillbilly on the killer side. Their perks are really good if you know how to use them.
Its a very interesting game though its very difficult to play as the killer

oyun güzel ama bazı toksik takım arkadaşları oyundan soğutabiliyor. Mesela siz birlitke kaçmak için uğraşırken bu puştlar direk kapıyı açıp kaçıyo. Siz böyle olmayın insanlara yardım edin. Eğer arkadaşlarınızla gircekseniz gayet iyi bir oyun bence.

In dead by daylight you can have fun with your friends or single. Friends can help you in mode : survivor. Also if you have 3 friends who  have Dead by Daylight You can play together and have fun. If you want play in alone you can play Killer. You can create amazing build on survivor or killer. Buffed perks, Combo perks, Toxic perks, and another. If you have 50lvl on survivor or killer you can press "prestige" and you can upgrade skills again, with new prestige. (3prestige in 1 killer/survivor). You can play Dead by Daylight a lot on survivor or killer. Also you can create Amazing add-ons on Items. When I had 50hours I could play feng min support as well. In dead by daylight (survivor) you can create support build or gene-rush.

I love this game because I have fun in this game with friends or in single.

Honestly it would be a fun game, but it's filled with bugs and error codes which just make the game so infuriating. The amount of times I get error codes and lose bloodpoints and rank is insane and honestly if this game wasn't cross play and the game market wasn't as dry as it is now, would uninstall without a second thought.
